Kyautar Ghislaine Dupont da Claude Verlon daga RFI
03 Nov 2019, 21:24 by Abdoulaye Issa

Gidan rediyon Faransa Rfi a ranar biyu ga wanan watan da muke cikin sa ya bayar da kyautar nan da aka da sunan yan jarida nan Ghislaine Dupont da Claude Verlon da wasu yan bindiga suka kashe a garin Kidal dake arewacin Mali shekaru shida da suka gabata.

A wanan karon daga cikin maâ€™aikatan kaffafen yada labarai na Jamhuriyar Demokkuradiyar Congo 200 ,guda 20 ne yanzu haka za su amfana da wannan garabasa.
Banda haka biyu daga cikin su da suka nuna hazaka a wannan aiki da suka hada da Myriam Iragi Maroy mai shekaru 30 da kuma ke aiki a wani gidan rediyo mai suna Radio Top Congo a Kinshasa da mai gyaran sautuka ko injiniya Vital Mugisho mai shekaru 26 ne yanzu haka za su je Paris inda za a basu horo dangane da dabarun aikin jarida a watan Fabrairu shekarar 2020.
Shugabanin Rediyon Faransa da suka hada Marie Christine Saragosse daga France Media Monde da Cecile Megie ne suka bayar da wadanan kyaututuka a Kinshasa.
text:
Ghislaine Dupont and Claude Verlon Award from RFI
03 Nov 2019, 21:24 by Abdoulaye Issa

The French radio station Rfi on the second day of this month won the award of the documentary Ghislaine Dupont, Claude Verlon and the gunmen who were killed in the town of Kidal in northern Mali six years ago.

At this stage, 20 of the 200 media workers of the Democratic Republic of the Congo will now benefit from the opportunity.
Two of them, including 30-year-old Myriam Iragi Maroy, who works at Radio Top Congo in Kinshasa and sound engineer Vital Mugisho, are 26 years old. they will now travel to Paris where they will be trained in journalism techniques in February 2020.
The awards were given in Kinshasa by French Radio Directors Marie Christine Saragosse from France Media Monde and Cecile Megie.
